alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; Rutherford; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 12:16PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rutherford, Coffee, southeastern Wilson, eastern Bedford and western Cannon Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Murfreesboro to 6 miles west of Tullahoma. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Shelbyville, Manchester, Woodbury, Smyrna, Tullahoma, Walterhill, Wartrace, Bell Buckle, Auburntown, Normandy, Lascassas, Christiana, Raus, Beechgrove, Fosterville, Deason, Bradyville, Milton and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 70 and 120. Interstate 840 between mile markers 51 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
